sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import moment from "moment"; import Header from "./../components/Header"; import { PayPalButton } from "react-paypal-button-v2"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getOrderDetails } from "../Redux/Actions/OrderActions"; import Loading from "../components/LoadingError/Loading"; import Message from "../components/LoadingError/Error"; const OrderScreen = ({match}) => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const orderId = match.params.id; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orderDetails = useSelector((state) => state.orderDetails); const { order, loading, error } = orderDetails; if (!loading) { // CALCULATE PRICE const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2); } order.itemsPrice = addDecimals( order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) ); } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) }, [dispatch,orderId]); return ( <>
{ loading ? () : error ? ({error}) : ( <>
Customer

{order.user.name}

{order.user.email}

{/* 2 */}
Order info

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.country}

Pay method: {order.paymentMethod}

{ order.isPaid ? (

Paid on {moment(order.paidAt).calendar()}

) : (

Not Paid

) }
{/* 3 */}
Deliver to

Address: {order.shippingAddress.city}, {""} {order.shippingAddress.address}, {""} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {""} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{ order.isDelivered ? (

Delivered

) : (

Not Delivered

) }
{ order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Your order is empty ) : ( <> { order.orderItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}

QUANTITY

{item.qty}

SUBTOTAL

${item.qty * item.price}
)) } ) }
{/* total */}
Products ${order.itemsPrice}
Shipping ${order.shippingPrice}
Tax ${order.taxPrice}
Total ${order.totalPrice}
) }
); }; export default OrderScreen;
